name: Admin Posts Manager – Posts manager for your posts
author: TheConcept

sections.description:
Admin posts manager lets you manage your post in a beautiful and easy way with advanced filtering options right into your admin panel. No refresh page needed, you can view,edit your posts in real time.

Features

  • [x] View Posts – Can view posts in real time.

  • [x] Edit Posts – Can quickly edit your posts.

    and many more coming soon…

Easy To Configure

There are no extra configurations required, you just need to activate the plugin.

Easy To Use Interface

It has a simple, user-friendly interface, through which you can manage your posts easily.

Light Weight and Instant Loading

Code is optimized for fast loading and instant live editing with no extra resources.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does it need any configuration

No, it is plug ‘n’ play plugin. Just install the plugin and it will start capturing and displaying reports from support form plugins.

Is it responsive

Yes, it is responsive with almost all the screen sizes.

How long will you manage/update it

I will manage this plugin as long as i could as i myself it on the daily basis also there are really amazing updates on the way ðŸ™‚

Why should i install this plugin

I would say just give it a try and see what it does for you. i am pretty sure it will be useful for you as its for mine.
It is going to change the way you manage your posts with the all upcoming awesome features.
sections.changelog:
0.0.2

22-06-2022
* Added: Quick edit actions.
* Added: User can Trash, Restore and Delete posts.
* Fixed: Filter by author does not work on changing the page number
* Optimized the code for faster loading

0.0.1

22-06-2022

  • Initial Plugin Launch
